name: Melon-and-Lime Parfait
keywords: dessert, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, lime, melon, yogurt, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 small Cavaillon melon or cantaloupe, seeded and flesh cut into chunks
1/2 teaspoon Banyuls or other flavorful white-wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Purée the melon in a food processor, then refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Combine the yogurt and lime zest. Divide the yogurt mixture among six glasses. Chill.
Just before serving, carefully pour the melon purée atop the yogurt in each glass.
In a food processor, combine the milk and vinegar and pulse until solidly foamy on top. Place a spoonful of the foam in each glass and serve immediately.
